messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR STEPHEN BARCLAY
messages.content:
1. He lives in the constituency, understands the issues affecting us and is actively local in getting things done.
2. He has a successful track record in business and, unlike many MPs today, has never worked before in politics.
3. He will be effective in speaking up for the interests of North East Cambridgeshire at Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Local Job Opportunities and Protect Services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As MP, Stephen Barclay will work hard to secure a fairer funding deal to improve local job opportunities and protect services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: North East Cambridgeshire is not getting its fair share of funding from the Labour Government.

endorsements.endorsement: We can't go on like this. We need change to put Britain back on its feet.

images.caption: Stephen Barclay talking with a constituent.
